HOMES.teleport.success.en-US: [grey]You have been teleported to your home [era_purple][home]</color>!</color>

HOMES.teleport.error.disabled.de-DE: [grey]Das Home [era_purple][home]</color> wurde automatisch oder von einem <red>Admin</red> <color:#ff0000>deaktiviert!</color></color>
HOMES.teleport.error.disabled.en-US: [grey]The home [era_purple][home]</color> has been disabled automatically or by an <red>Admin</red> <color:#ff0000>!</color></color>

HOMES.create.error.limit.de-DE: [grey]Du hast bereits das <yellow>Maximum an Homes</yellow> <dark_grey>([red][limit]</color> [grey]/</color> [green][max]</color>)</dark_grey> erreicht!</color>
HOMES.create.error.limit.en-US: [grey]You have already reached the [yellow]maximum limit of homes</color> <dark_grey>([[era_purple][limit]</color>)</dark_grey>!</color>

HOMES.view.self.error.de-DE: [grey]DU kannst deine [era_purple]eigenen Homes</color> nicht im [red]Admin-Modus</color> anschauen!</color>
HOMES.view.self.error.en-US: [grey]You can't view your [era_purple]own homes</color> in [red]Admin mode!</color></color>

HOMES.teleport.error.exist.de-DE: [grey]Das [era_purple]Home,</color> zu welchem du dich [era_purple]teleportieren</color> willst, existiert [red]nicht</color> mehr!</color>
